title: VWAP Reversion (Intraday)
objective: Fade stretched moves back to VWAP on intraday timeframes.
caveats: Choppy sessions and halts can degrade performance.
compliance_note: For education only; not investment advice.
beginner_summary: Fade stretched intraday moves back to VWAP with tight risk controls.
assistant_hints: Only trade liquid symbols during RTH.
Require volume support; avoid fading news spikes.
Use ATR-based stops and strict daily loss limits.
Prefer small, repeatable edges over home runs.
